name: GPT-4o Audio Preview (Jun 2025)
description: GPT-4o Audio Preview June 2025 release with advanced audio processing capabilities, optimized for asynchronous audio input and output with prompt caching support.
notes: June 3, 2025 update maintains the December 2024 pricing structure with $40/$80 per 1M audio tokens. Supports prompt caching at $2.50 per 1M tokens. Focused on text and audio modalities only - does not support image/vision capabilities.
